ai.summary: An easy 3.9 km hike in the UK countryside suitable for beginners and families. The route features gentle terrain and pleasant views, making it a relaxing walk with a light elevation gain.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily well-maintained gravel and dirt paths with gentle undulations. Expect occasional muddy patches after rain and a few exposed roots; overall easy for most walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather forecasts before you go, as UK conditions can change rapidly. Wear sturdy footwear and stay on marked paths. Bring a waterproof layer and an extra warm layer. Carry water and a small snack. Mobile reception can be limited; let someone know your plan and expected return time. Carry a map or offline navigation, and bring a head torch if you might be out near dusk. Allow 60â€“120 minutes for the hike.
recommended_gear: Mobile phone (fully charged); consider offline navigation
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn (roughly March to October); summers offer longer daylight though weather can be unpredictable.

seo.title: Lodge Trail: Easy 3.9 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Lodge Trail, an easy 3.9 km hike in the UK countryside. Gentle terrain, safety tips, and a gear checklist for a relaxed day outdoors.
seo.h1: Lodge Trail - 3.9 km Easy Hike in the UK
